edge: Riteish Deshmukh portrays the character of Jaswinder in the movie.
The character of Jimmy is played by Riteish Deshmukh in the movie.
Hrishitaa Bhatt and Richa Bedi are portrayed by the same actress, Hrishitaa Bhatt, in the movie.
The character of Sally is played by Brande Roderick in the movie.
The character of Anand Raj Anand is portrayed by the actor, Anand Raj Anand, in the movie.
The character of Jatta Singh Bedi is portrayed by Amrish Puri in the movie.
The character of Flower is played by Satish Shah in the movie.
The character of Mango Singh is portrayed by Satish Kaushik in the movie.
The character of Philip J. Roberts is played by Kenneth Mergen in the movie.
